title: Everything's Connected (feat. Kirk Hammett)
description:
Jay, Dan and the crew discuss the lack of cleanliness amongst previous generations, particularly those settling the West. Jacob tells a surprising story of getting a happy ending massage. Dan interviews Kirk Hammett of Metallica for the 30 year anniversary of The Black Album and The Blacklist Album out now! 

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire 

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM 

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com 

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayComedy.com
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kirk Hammett)
